The sustained use discount has been applied to the target cost, resulting in significant monthly savings.

The e2-medium machine type is selected as it offers a lower monthly cost (74.59 USD) compared to the current n1-standard-1 (105.75 USD), resulting in monthly savings of 31.16 USD.
